since you have stopped uploading which is a shame what website do you download the web-dl tv shows from??

UseNet - well worth the ten bucks a month.

It allows SSL encryption so nobody can spy on your habits.

Also, it's a download only situation, so no upload stress on your resources.

Use an nzb search engine to see what's there and then find a newsreader (usenet for "client software" ).

Good luck

p.s. - all the stuff I can't post here, I'm posting there.

AVIGUY
cant use usent have you tried uploading to other torrent websites??

That's a shame, UseNet has done something quite amazing.

With UseNet you hear the term "expired", meaning that a posted article is there for a certain time and then it's gone.

And then one day nothing was ever gone again. Advertised retention rates will always point back to early September 2008.

This means it is a permanent repository for the human race without any sort of gatekeeper whatsoever. Make it a personal cloud storage facility for free - just pay for access, not storage.
